about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Professional VIN to PIN services for Kia & Hyundai locksmiths worldwide.

seo.title: About Us | Kia Hyundai PIN Code
seo.description: Learn about our Kia & Hyundai VIN to PIN platform built for locksmiths. Fast results, accurate data, 24/7 support.

body.p1: PIN Code platform is built for professional automotive locksmiths who need fast and accurate Kia / Hyundai PIN code calculations. Our system is online 24/7 and designed to remove delays from your workflow.
body.p2: Whether you handle a single VIN or bulk requests daily, we provide clear pricing, tier discounts, and reliable results — with no hidden renewals. Tokens never expire.

fast.title: Fast Results
fast.desc: Most VIN requests are processed within minutes, helping you finish jobs quickly.

accurate.title: High Accuracy
accurate.desc: We use validated sources and real-world data for consistent results.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: Need help? Our team is available day and night.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your data matters. Here is how we collect and protect it.

seo.title: Privacy Policy | Kia Hyundai PIN Code
seo.description: Read our privacy policy to learn how PIN Code platform collects, uses, and protects your data.

s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
s1.body: We collect basic account information such as your name, email, and phone number, along with VIN requests and order history to provide services.

s2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
s2.body: Your information is used to process VIN requests, manage your wallet and tokens, send order notifications, and improve the platform.

s3.title: 3. Data Security
s3.body: We apply industry-standard security practices to protect your data. However, no online system can guarantee 100% protection.

s4.title: 4. Sharing Your Data
s4.body: We do not sell or rent your data. We only share data when required to provide the service or comply with legal obligations.

s5.title: 5. Contact
s5.body: If you have any questions about privacy, contact us at support@pin-code.com.

seo.title: Terms & Conditions | Kia Hyundai PIN Code
seo.description: Review the terms and conditions for using the Kia Hyundai PIN Code platform, wallet and VIN services.

s1.title: 1. Service Overview
s1.body: We provide online VIN to PIN code calculation services for Kia and Hyundai vehicles. Results are delivered digitally.

s2.title: 2. Tokens & Wallet
s2.body: Tokens are used to request services. Tokens do not expire and are non-refundable once consumed.

s3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
s3.body: You are responsible for submitting correct VINs. Incorrect VINs may lead to invalid results.

s4.title: 4. Refund Policy
s4.body: Because results are digital and delivered immediately, refunds are only considered for proven system errors.

s5.title: 5. Support & Updates
s5.body: We may update the platform and these terms anytime. Continued use means you accept the latest version.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about Kia / Hyundai PIN services.

seo.title: FAQ | Kia Hyundai PIN Code
seo.description: Find answers about VIN to PIN services, token usage, delivery time, and supported Hyundai / Kia models.

i1.q: What is a VIN to PIN service?
i1.a: It is an online service that calculates the immobilizer PIN code from a vehicle VIN. It’s used by automotive locksmiths to add keys or reset immobilizer systems.

i2.q: Which Kia / Hyundai models are supported?
i2.a: We support most Kia and Hyundai vehicles. The platform offers separate services depending on model year (old vs new).

i3.q: How fast do I get the PIN result?
i3.a: Most VIN requests are completed within minutes. In rare cases, it may take longer depending on the VIN type.

i4.a: No. Tokens never expire. You can use them anytime in the future.

i5.q: Can I buy tokens in bulk?
i5.a: Yes. We offer tiered pricing, so the more tokens you buy, the lower the price per token.

i6.q: What if I enter a wrong VIN?
i6.a: You are responsible for submitting the correct VIN. If the VIN is invalid, the result may be wrong and tokens may still be consumed.

i7.a: Because the service is digital and delivered instantly, refunds are only considered for verified system errors.

i8.a: You can contact us anytime via WhatsApp or email. We provide 24/7 online support.

help.title: Still need help?
